1.16.5.1.16.5-1.2.4:

1.12.2.1.12.2-1.1.0:
This major release contains ancient and decayed leaves for vanilla trees, bug fixes, and implementation of the forge update checker.

Changes:
• Added ancient leaves, which work on all vanilla dynamic trees.
• Added decayed leaves, which work on all vanilla dynamic trees.
• Added forge update checker.
• Now works with newer versions of Dynamic Trees.
• Updated to new DT naming conventions.
• Added species localisation.
• Other minor fixes and changes.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.2:
• Added Ancient Acorn ritual of the forest recipe, which is the normal Ancient Sapling recipe with an oak acorn instead of oak sapling.
• Changed icon.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.1:
• Fixed some leaves not having tile entities tied to them, which meant they wouldn’t integrate with aura or show particles.
• Fixed icon not showing up in mod list.
